borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Internal alterations at lower ground floor include: the demolition of boiler room, rear wall and external stairs to facilitate the erection of a rear extension; renewal of gas and electric store cupboards re-arrangement of lower ground floor including the installation of a new kitchen, heating system, and wall insulation, minor alteration to fireplace; installation of lower ground floor doorway below entrance door; Internal works at ground floor level include: re-instatement of fireplaces and interior panelling, removal of radiators, renewal of cupboard; Internal works at first floor level include: the re-arrangement of the existing front room to accommodate a bathroom and dressing room, including the re-hanging of the entrance door, insertion of a new access from landing area to existing bathroom, reinstatement of fireplaces and removal of cupboards; Internal alterations at second floor level include: demolition of modern partition walls and bathroom within the rear room to create larger bedroom, increased size of loft hatch, installation of a bathroom with the utility room on the landing; associated internal alterations and re-arrangements; External alterations to include erection of a single storey rear extension to the main building at lower ground floor level, including the demolition of the rear wall, boiler room and external stairs, and retaining garden wall; erection of an external staircase from lower ground floor level to ground floor level in the rear garden; excavation of the front garden to reinstate the original front lightwell, and remedial works to all doors and windows and to the front boundary brick wall, including the installation of raised brick pillars and a larger wrought iron gate and lantern.
